name: Magika's Adventure
description:
Magika's Adventure is a 2D Action Platformer game with pixel art style. You play as Magika, a little wizard from the south of Midory, a land where monsters and magic, as he began his quest to defeat Nagamura, the king of monsters and the ruler of the Underworld, home to all monsters.

Controls

Left Arrow : Move Left

Right Arrow : Move Right

Up Arrow : Jump

Spacebar : Shoot Fireball
